title: Fundamentals of Ethics
description: Comprehensive study of ethics with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Introduction to Thermodynamics
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in thermodynamics. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Applied Systems
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of systems. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

description: In-depth analysis of design principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

description: Advanced exploration of dynamics covering current research and industry practices.

description: Comprehensive study of systems with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

description: Advanced exploration of controls covering current research and industry practices.
